/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a two-lane road stretching into the distance, flanked by lush greenery on both sides. The road, curving gently to the right, is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few wispy clouds scattered across it. The sun, positioned in the top left corner of the image, casts a bright light, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the road appear as if it's leading towards the horizon. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
